channel.title: [Pi] Need help with making portal give Options
channel.description: How do I make a portal Give several teleport options?

item.title: [Pi] Need help with making portal give Options
item.dc:creator: @Andys_Awesome Andys Awesome
item.description:
@Andys_Awesome wrote:

I think he just magicly wants this to happen. I hate PI but this is how I think it would be done. Look into this a bit and you will pull it off.

Most PIâ€™s have an interface that comes up asking which place you would like to go when you use a teleport from the mage book.

I believe that this same type of interface is what you wanted to have for your portal.

There is an action number that your server gives off to identify what action your trying to preform. Find the action numbers for when you click on your portal, and find the action numbers for when you clicked on the teleport. Try copy pasting the codes after your Teleport action sequence to your portal sequence.

Then use one of the teleports and type ::mypos , go back to your serverfiles and search for that x: and Y: you will find some codes that look like this c.getDH().sendOption4("Edgeville", "Al Kharid", "Karamja", "Draynor Village"); c.usingGlory = true; c.usingROD = false; c.usingGamesNeck = false;
Try copy pasting the codes after your Teleport action sequence to your portal sequence.

Read full topic
item.source: [Pi] Need help with making portal give Options

item.title: [Pi] Need help with making portal give Options
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

You need to be more specific. Are you wanting to click the portal and have it send you a frame that you can make teleportation options? Or do you want to add more options to the right-click object?

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Need help with making portal give Options
item.dc:creator: @Andys_Awesome Andys Awesome
item.description:
@Andys_Awesome wrote:

click on the portal, then check the server screen and find the action numbers associated to the portal, you can then reference that to your options
